attributes.title: Terrible❤️
attributes.review: Well I saw this app in the App Store and saw the words trump across it and immediately hated it, but since I never like to judge a book by its cover I downloaded it just to find out ITS PROBABLY TO ME.😖😖 so I deleted it. and then I went to his twitter to totally not report him because I would never do that to our wonderful and totally not racist president🥰 good day to you all

attributes.title: Oh my goodness 😳🤡
attributes.review: I had downloaded the app a few days ago and when I started it up my mom broke her back I called the White House requesting to speak to the manager but apparently he was busy clearing his credit card purchases. But I demanded it and they told ME no and I spoke to the assistant manager. He went by Barron, (#savebarron) I got my refund thanks so much Barron for refunding my app.

attributes.title: Trump app
attributes.review: This is such a bad app I downloaded it and as soon as I opened it all my plates fell out of my cupboard. I thought it was just coincidence but then as my day went on more bad things started to happen. For example all the TVs in my house exploded as well as the lights flickered. I didn’t want to believe the rest of the reviews but they are right the app is cursed!!!!!!!

attributes.title: I👁was🤨expecting😥different😔things😭
attributes.review: When I opened the application, my hamster was all comfy and ready to watch spongebob. After a couple light years I realized I forgot to change the rubber stoppers on my flying horse.😭 soon after my flying🧚horse passed on. I’m very disappointed and confused, how could someone be such a cruel person and kill my horse...😭😭come on now.

attributes.title: take this off the app store
attributes.review: couldn’t be worse, i’d give it 0 stars if i could. i’m shaking and crying as i write this. as soon as i opened the app i was sent down an emotional spiral. i was immediately asked for all my credit card info, i am being harassed and sent multiple spam texts, calls, emails. my family is scared, we’re now getting threats. this app is terrifying and frankly a danger to the citizens of this country. all i wanted was to support my racist, homophobic, transphobic, misogynistic, child predatory, etc., president but i’m afraid i cannot use this app due to the negative experience i had.

attributes.title: Trump 2020 But Not Anymore
attributes.review: I have been a strong Trump Supportive since 1978 and this app is horrendous!! The audacity that these people have of asking for my email is frankly disgusting and creepy!!! The President Preached about protecting us from Russian Spies but the email was created in Russia that’s why I have my own Private Server to keep myself safe!! Not my President Anymore!!! Leave my Emails Alone!!!!

attributes.title: ABSOLUTE GARBAGE
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I very much support the best president Donald Trump. But in downloading this app I suddenly lost all brain cells I have been admitted into the hospital because my lack of brain cells is causing me to spew absolute nonsense such as “support trump” and “trump 2020” so I recommend against downloading this app at all cost because you may end up with not a single braincell left, like me. DON’T VOTE TRUMP 2020

attributes.title: TRACKING YOU!!
attributes.review: After downloading this app I found you have to submit your phone number. If you check your settings later in your phone it shows there is now a COVID tracker in your PHONE!!! I then googled some of the news in this app and it’s!! This app is FAKE NEWS!!!! I think RUSSIA created this app to make things up and TRACK US!!! Be warned!!! RUSSIA IS ALL OVER THIS APP AND I KNOW IT!!! 🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸

attributes.title: Decent app except...
attributes.review: I could NOT enjoy the app because of the sheer amount of ads that showed up on, which is probably a bug. Hopefully it gets patched soon and this isn't a problem for many. In all honesty I'd rather spread my cheeks in front of starved lions than use this broken app, so I'd recommend to not waste your downloading it.

attributes.title: Poor design
attributes.review: I donate regularly to DJT & related causes.  I loaded the app and registered.  I then made a donation.  Then I logged out.  Now it wont let me log back in.  Why should I even need to log back... my iPhone has face recognition.  How can Trump win if programmers working for the cause are that incompetent?  Yipes.  Fix it.
